articles.title: Hong Kong to benefit from China’s Didi crackdown, IPO rules overhaul - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Many of China’s high-flying technology companies have opted for IPOs in the US, as it has the deepest and most liquid market globally. The tide, however, maybe turning, with the likes of LinkDoc Technology putting their US listing plans on hold.
